wizard.title: Plan session
wizard.subtitle: Build a polished plan by working through each stage.
wizard.successSubtitle: We’ll take it from here. {{name}} is on the calendar.

toast.draftCapturedDescription: Lo-fi wizard completed. Wire backend save before rollout.
toast.sessionCreatedDescription: All reminders and workflows are being processed.
toast.sessionCreationFailedDescription: Please review the form and try again.
toast.sessionWorkflowWarningDescription: Notifications may be delayed. Check automation settings.
toast.sessionUpdateFailedDescription: Please review the changes and try again.
toast.sessionLoadFailedDescription: Please close the wizard and try again.

validation.missingLead: Select or create a lead before confirming.
validation.missingSchedule: Select both a session date and time.

lead.description: Select an existing lead or create someone new to attach to this session.
lead.useExistingDescription: Search for existing leads in your workspace.
lead.emptyState: No leads available yet. Create one to get started.

project.description: Link the session to an existing project or spin up a new one.
project.useExistingDescription: Pick from projects assigned to the selected lead.
project.createNewDescription: Start a fresh project for this lead.
project.selectLeadFirst: Select a lead before choosing a project.
project.noProjects: No projects found for this lead.
project.emptyState: No projects found for this lead.

sessionType.description: Choose the type of session. The finalized experience will pull from the organization's configured session types.
sessionType.optionDescription: Demo copy — real labels will come from session settings.
sessionType.fallbackDescription: Update this session type in settings to add a helpful summary.
sessionType.emptyDescription: Add or enable session types from Settings → Services to keep planning moving.

consultation.helper: Recommended for discovery calls or planning meetings.
consultation.tooltip: Use this when you want to log a planning or discovery conversation with a client.

portrait.helper: Great for studio or on-location portrait shoots.
portrait.tooltip: Track individual or family portrait sessions with this option.

wedding.helper: Designed for full wedding coverage or key-day events.
wedding.tooltip: Select this when scheduling ceremonies, receptions, or wedding-day touchpoints.

other.helper: Catch-all for custom or experimental experiences.
other.tooltip: Pick this when none of the predefined session types fit what you’re planning.

location.description: Capture where the session happens and confirm the client-facing details.
location.addNewDescription: Keep frequent venues handy with one tap.
location.editDescription: Update the details and we will keep it in sync.
location.quickApplyHint: Select any card to auto-fill the form
location.customDescription: Set a location just for this session without saving it.
location.emptyState: Save your first location to keep it ready for the next session.
location.noSavedReminder: You can store trusted locations above so they’re ready next time.
location.toastSavedDescription: We’ll reuse it wherever you need it.
location.toastUpdatedDescription: The latest details are ready to use.
location.toastDeletedDescription: It’s no longer listed in your quick picks.
location.toastErrorDescription: Please try again or check your connection.
location.toastValidationDescription: Add a label and address to keep this location handy.
location.clientFacingHelper: Clients will see this location in reminders and summary emails.
location.invalidMeetingUrl: Meeting link must start with http:// or https://

schedule.description: Pick a date and start time. Both are required before you can continue.

notes.description: Add optional notes that will sync to the lead or project timeline.
notes.notesPlaceholder: Prep checklist, reminders, or client preferences.
notes.noPresets: Store your go-to reminders here for quick reuse.
notes.addPresetDescription: Give it a title and the text you want to reuse.
notes.newPresetBodyPlaceholder: Share reminders or expectations you'll reuse.
notes.savePresetHint: Saved notes stay available for every session
notes.toastSavedDescription: You can reuse it in future sessions.
notes.toastDeletedDescription: It will no longer appear in your quick picks.
notes.toastErrorDescription: Please try again in a moment.
notes.clientFacingHelper: Notes are shared in client communications. Keep them short and clear.

summary.description: Review the plan and make final edits before confirming.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Choose which updates we send automatically to your client.
notifications.remindersDescription: Send a reminder before the session starts.
notifications.summaryDescription: Send the session details right after you confirm the booking.
notifications.workflowNoneConfigured: No workflows are configured for this notification yet.
notifications.workflowMissingReminder: Reminders are enabled, but no reminder workflows are configured.
notifications.workflowMissingSummary: Summary is enabled, but no summary workflows are configured.
notifications.workflowOptOut: Disabled above, so we will not run it.

guardrail.unsavedDescription: You're in the middle of scheduling a session. Keep editing or discard your changes.

draft.resumeDescription: We found a saved session draft for this context. Pick up where you left off or start fresh.
